thread.title: Photo Alert: The Bachchan Family Attends A Grand Wedding
thread.title_full: Photo Alert: The Bachchan Family Attends A Grand Wedding

author: Swagata Dam
title: Photo Alert: The Bachchan Family Attends A Grand Wedding
text:
Swagata Dam Mar . 18 . 2017 Amitabh Bachchan, Jaya Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan 
Abhishek , Jaya and Amitabh Bachchan recently attending a grand destination wedding. All of them were seen donning gorgeous desi outfits and AB Jr. looked incredibly hot in a powder pink Sabyasachi sherwani . Here’s a photo of the Bachchan trio at the shaandaar shaadi. A post shared by Sabyasachi Mukherjee (@sabyasachiofficial) on Mar 17, 2017 at 9:02am PDT 
The Bachchans never cease to exude a royal charm, isn’t it? 4
